data.name: AdapterAddMemberDescription
data.value: Add member to abstraction.

data.name: AdapterAddMemberMessageFormat
data.value: Add member {0} to abstraction {1}

data.name: AdapterAddMemberTitle
data.value: Add member to abstraction

data.name: AdapterCallFactoryDescription
data.value: Call factory method.

data.name: AdapterCallFactoryMessageFormat
data.value: Call factory method to convert {0} to {1}

data.name: AdapterCallFactoryTitle
data.value: Call factory method

data.name: AdapterDefinitionDescription
data.value: Adapter definition.

data.name: AdapterDefinitionMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter definition for {0}

data.name: AdapterDefinitionTitle
data.value: Adapter definition

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeAttributeDescription
data.value: Adapter types must be attributes.

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeAttributeMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter type {0} must derive from attribute

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeAttributeTitle
data.value: Adapter types must be attributes

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeConstructorCountDescription
data.value: Adapter types must have correct constructor count.

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeConstructorCountMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter type {0} should only have {1} constructor(s)

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeConstructorCountTitle
data.value: Adapter types must have correct constructor count

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterCountDescription
data.value: Adapter attribute constructors must have correct parameter count.

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterCountMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter attribute {0} constructor must have {1} parameter(s)

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterCountTitle
data.value: Adapter attribute constructors must have correct parameter count

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterDescription
data.value: Adapter attributes must have correct constructor parameter.

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter attribute {0} parameter should be of type {1}

data.name: AdapterDescriptorTypeParameterTitle
data.value: Adapter attributes must have correct constructor parameter

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustBeStaticDescription
data.value: Adapter factory method must be static.

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustBeStaticMessageFormat
data.value: Adapter factory method {0} must be static

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustBeStaticTitle
data.value: Adapter factory method must be static

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustExistDescription
data.value: Specified adapter factory must exist.

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustExistMessageFormat
data.value: Specified adapter factory method {0} on type {1} does not exist

data.name: AdapterFactoryMustExistTitle
data.value: Specified adapter factory must exist

data.name: AdapterRefactorDescription
data.value: Refactor usage to another type.

data.name: AdapterRefactorMessageFormat
data.value: Refactor usage of type {0} to {1}

data.name: AdapterRefactorTitle
data.value: Refactor usage of type to another type

data.name: AdapterStaticMemberDescription
data.value: Redirect static member access to alternate member.

data.name: AdapterStaticMemberMessageFormat
data.value: Change call from {0} to {1}

data.name: AdapterStaticMemberTitle
data.value: Redirect static member access to alternate member

data.name: ApiAlertGenericDescription
data.value: This type is not supported on .NET Core/.NET 5+ and should be replaced with a modern equivalent.

data.name: AddAdapterDescriptorTitle
data.value: Add an adapter descriptor class

data.name: AddAdapterDescriptorDescription
data.value: Create an adapter descriptor class to facilitate migrations away from this deprecated type.

data.name: AddAdapterDescriptorMessageFormat
data.value: Create an adapter descriptor class with assembly attribute '{0}'

data.name: ApiAlertGenericTitle
data.value: Replace unsupported API

data.name: AttributeUpgradeDescription
data.value: This attribute type is not supported on .NET Core/.NET 5+ and should be replaced with a modern equivalent.

data.name: AttributeUpgradeMessageFormat
data.value: Attribute type '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: AttributeUpgradeTitle
data.value: Attributes should be upgraded

data.name: BinaryFormatterUnsafeDeserializeDescription
data.value: 'UnsafeDeserialize()' should be replaced with 'Deserialize()'.

data.name: BinaryFormatterUnsafeDeserializeMessageFormat
data.value: 'UnsafeDeserialize()' should be replaced with 'Deserialize()'

data.name: BinaryFormatterUnsafeDeserializeTitle
data.value: 'UnsafeDeserialize()' does not exist

data.name: FilterDescription
data.value: Filter-related types should come from the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters namespace in ASP.NET Core.

data.name: FilterMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: FilterTitle
data.value: Filter types should be used from the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters namespace

data.name: HelperResultDescription
data.value: HelperResult should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.HelperResult.

data.name: HelperResultMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: HelperResultTitle
data.value: HelperResult should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.HelperResult

data.name: HtmlHelperDescription
data.value: HtmlHelper should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.HtmlHelper or Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper.

data.name: HtmlHelperMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: HtmlHelperTitle
data.value: HtmlHelper should be replaced with IHtmlHelper

data.name: HtmlStringDescription
data.value: HtmlString, IHtmlString, and MvcHtmlString types should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlString.

data.name: HtmlStringMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlString

data.name: HtmlStringTitle
data.value: HtmlString types should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlString

data.name: HttpContextCurrentDescription
data.value: HttpContext does not have a Current property; get the context from a controller or use HttpContextAccessor instead.

data.name: HttpContextCurrentMessageFormat
data.value: HttpContext does not have a Current property; get the context from a controller or use HttpContextAccessor instead

data.name: HttpContextCurrentTitle
data.value: Do not use HttpContext.Current

data.name: HttpContextDebuggingEnabledDescription
data.value: HttpContext.DebuggerEnabled does not exist in ASP.NET Core and should be replaced with System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsAttached.

data.name: HttpContextDebuggingEnabledMessageFormat
data.value: HttpContext.DebuggerEnabled should be replaced with System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsAttached

data.name: HttpContextDebuggingEnabledTitle
data.value: HttpContext.DebuggerEnabled should be replaced with System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsAttached

data.name: ResultTypeDescription
data.value: ActionResult types should come from the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc namespace in ASP.NET Core.

data.name: ResultTypeMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: ResultTypeTitle
data.value: ActionResult types should come from the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc namespace

data.name: TypeUpgradeDescription
data.value: This type is not supported on .NET Core/.NET 5+ and should be replaced with a modern equivalent.

data.name: TypeUpgradeMessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: TypeUpgradeTitle
data.value: Types should be upgraded

data.name: UrlHelperDescription
data.value: UrlHelper should be replaced with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IUrlHelper or Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Routing.UrlHelper.

data.name: UrlHelperMessageFormat
data.value: Identifier '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: UrlHelperTitle
data.value: UrlHelper should be replaced with IUrlHelper

data.name: UsingSystemDeployment
data.value: System.Deployment is not supported on .NET Core

data.name: UsingSystemDeploymentDescription
data.value: System.Deployment is not supported on .NET Core

data.name: UsingSystemWebDescription
data.value: ASP.NET Core projects should not reference System.Web or OWIN namespaces.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: UsingSystemWebMessageFormat
data.value: Namespace '{0}' should not be referenced in ASP.NET Core projects
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: UsingSystemWebTitle
data.value: ASP.NET Core projects should not reference ASP.NET namespaces
